name: Undead Showdown
description:
🢂 Can you survive the horrors of the undead? 🡸

Prove yourself in this fun little zombie, wave based game. Using the money you gain from killing the undead creatures, you must arm yourself to the teeth if you ought to survive the Undead Showdown.

May god have mercy on your soul...

•Controls•

  • WASD - Move character
  • LMB - Shoot
  • 1,2,3,4,5 - Switch to different weapons
  • H - Use Health pack
  • Keep Pressing R to load bullets into the weapon.
  • Space - Start Wave

•About this Game•

• This is a fun little game that I spent around 3 days making with no prior GML (GameMaker: Studio) coding experience. I had a lot of fun creating this game and it is something I plan to update with more levels, more refined mechanics and lots of different enemy types! But for now, enjoy this little demo that I managed to put together for the WIG game jam! :)

•Credit•

  • Level & Menu music created by Rockstar Games.
  • Randomly Generated sound effects from "sfxr.me".
  • Art and Design by Miles Carr.
  • Programming by Miles Carr.
